= Queries =

== Generic Domain Queries ==

 * *Query 1.1:* Find all information about Barack Obama.

{{{
SELECT ?predicate ?object WHERE {
   { dbpedia:Barack_Obama ?predicate ?object }
  UNION
   { ?subject owl:sameAs dbpedia:Barack_Obama .
     ?subject ?predicate ?object } }
}}}

  [http://iwb.fluidops.com/search.jsp?q=SELECT+%3Fpredicate+%3Fobject+WHERE+{+{+%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fdbpedia.org%2Fresource%2FBarack_Obama%3E+%3Fpredicate+%3Fobject+}+UNION+{++%3Fsubject+%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2002%2F07%2Fowl%23sameAs%3E+%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fdbpedia.org%2Fresource%2FBarack_Obama%3E+.+++%3Fsubject+%3Fpredicate+%3Fobject+}+} Try this Query on our Information Workbench]

 * *Query 1.2:* Return Barack Obama's party membership and news pages.

{{{
SELECT ?party ?page WHERE {
   dbpedia:Barack_Obama dbpedia-owl:Person/party ?party .
   ?x nytimes:topicPage ?page .
   ?x owl:sameAs dbpedia:Barack_Obama }
}}}

  [http://iwb.fluidops.com/search.jsp?q=SELECT+%3Fparty+%3Fpage++WHERE+{+%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fdbpedia.org%2Fresource%2FBarack_Obama%3E+%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fdbpedia.org%2Fontology%2FPerson%2Fparty%3E+%3Fparty+.+%3Fx+%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fdata.nytimes.com%2Felements%2FtopicPage%3E+%3Fpage+.+%3Fx+%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2002%2F07%2Fowl%23sameAs%3E+%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fdbpedia.org%2Fresource%2FBarack_Obama%3E+.+} Try this Query on our Information Workbench]

 * *Query 1.3:* Return for all US presidents their party membership and news pages about them.

{{{
SELECT ?pres ?party ?page WHERE {
   ?pres rdf:type dbpedia-owl:President .
   ?pres dbpedia-owl:Person/nationality dbpedia:United_States .
   ?pres dbpedia-owl:Person/party ?party .
   ?x nytimes:topicPage ?page .
   ?x owl:sameAs ?pres }
}}}

  [http://iwb.fluidops.com/search.jsp?q=SELECT+%3Fpresident+%3Fparty+%3Fpage+WHERE+{+%3Fpresident+%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F1999%2F02%2F22-rdf-syntax-ns%23type%3E+%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fdbpedia.org%2Fontology%2FPresident%3E+.+%3Fpresident+%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fdbpedia.org%2Fontology%2FPerson%2Fnationality%3E+%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fdbpedia.org%2Fresource%2FUnited_States%3E+.+%3Fpresident+%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fdbpedia.org%2Fontology%2FPerson%2Fparty%3E+%3Fparty+.+%3Fx+%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fdata.nytimes.com%2Felements%2FtopicPage%3E+%3Fpage+.+%3Fx+%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2002%2F07%2Fowl%23sameAs%3E+%3Fpresident+.+} Try this Query on our Information Workbench]

 * *Query 1.4:* Find all news about actors starring in a movie with name Tarzan.

{{{
SELECT ?actor ?news WHERE {
   ?film purl:title 'Tarzan' .
   ?film linkedMDB:actor ?actor .
   ?actor owl:sameAs ?x.
   ?y owl:sameAs ?x .
   ?y nytimes:topicPage ?news }
}}}

  [http://iwb.fluidops.com/search.jsp?q=SELECT+%3Factor+%3Fnews+WHERE+{+%3Ffilm+%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fpurl.org%2Fdc%2Fterms%2Ftitle%3E+%27Tarzan%27+.+%3Ffilm+%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fdata.linkedmdb.org%2Fresource%2Fmovie%2Factor%3E+%3Factor+.+%3Factor+%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2002%2F07%2Fowl%23sameAs%3E+%3Fx.+%3Fy+%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2002%2F07%2Fowl%23sameAs%3E+%3Fx+.+%3Fy+%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fdata.nytimes.com%2Felements%2FtopicPage%3E+%3Fnews+} Try this Query on our Information Workbench]

 * *Query 1.5:* Find the director and the genre of movies directed by Italians.

{{{
SELECT ?film ?director ?genre WHERE {
   ?film dbpedia-owl:Film/director ?director.
   ?director dbpedia-owl:Person/nationality dbpedia:Italy .
   ?x owl:sameAs ?film .
   ?x linkedMDB:genre ?genre }
}}}

  [http://iwb.fluidops.com/search.jsp?q=SELECT+%3Ffilm+%3Fdirector+%3Fgenre+WHERE+{+%3Ffilm+%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fdbpedia.org%2Fontology%2FFilm%2Fdirector%3E+%3Fdirector.+%3Fdirector%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fdbpedia.org%2Fontology%2FPerson%2Fnationality%3E+%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fdbpedia.org%2Fresource%2FItaly%3E++.+%3Fx+%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2002%2F07%2Fowl%23sameAs%3E+%3Ffilm+.+%3Fx+%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fdata.linkedmdb.org%2Fresource%2Fmovie%2Fgenre%3E+%3Fgenre+} Try this Query on our Information Workbench]

 * *Query 1.6:* Find all musical artists based in Germany.

{{{
SELECT ?name ?location ?news WHERE {
   ?artist foaf:name ?name .
   ?artist foaf:based_near ?location .
   ?location geonames:parentFeature ?germany .
   ?germany geonames:name 'Federal Republic of Germany' }
}}}

  [http://iwb.fluidops.com/search.jsp?q=SELECT+%3Fname%3Flocation+%3Fnews++WHERE+{+%3Fartist+%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fxmlns.com%2Ffoaf%2F0.1%2Fname%3E+%3Fname+.+%3Fartist+%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fxmlns.com%2Ffoaf%2F0.1%2Fbased_near%3E+%3Flocation+.+%3Flocation+%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fwww.geonames.org%2Fontology%23parentFeature%3E+%3Fgermany+.+%3Fgermany%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fwww.geonames.org%2Fontology%23name%3E+%27Federal+Republic+of+Germany%27+} Try this Query on our Information Workbench]

 * *Query 1.7:* Find all news about locations in the state of California.

{{{
SELECT ?location ?news WHERE {
   ?location geonames:parentFeature ?parent .
   ?parent geonames:name 'California'  .
   ?y owl:sameAs ?location.
   ?y nytimes:topicPage ?news }
}}}

  [http://iwb.fluidops.com/search.jsp?q=SELECT+%3Flocation+%3Fnews+WHERE+{+%3Flocation+%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fwww.geonames.org%2Fontology%23parentFeature%3E+%3Fparent+.+%3Fparent+%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fwww.geonames.org%2Fontology%23name%3E+%27California%27++.+%3Fy+%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2002%2F07%2Fowl%23sameAs%3E+%3Flocation.+%3Fy+%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fdata.nytimes.com%2Felements%2FtopicPage%3E+%3Fnews+} Try this Query on our Information Workbench]

== Life Sciences Domain Queries ==

 * *Query 2.1:* Find all drugs from {\tt Drugbank} and {\tt DBpedia} with their melting points.

{{{
SELECT ?drug ?melt WHERE {
   { ?drug drugbank:meltingPoint ?melt . }
  UNION
   { ?drug dbpedia:meltingPoint ?melt . } }
}}}

  [http://iwb.fluidops.com/search.jsp?q=SELECT+%24drug+%24melt+WHERE+{+++++{+%24drug+%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fwww4.wiwiss.fu-berlin.de%2Fdrugbank%2Fresource%2Fdrugbank%2FmeltingPoint%3E+%24melt.+}+++++UNION+++++{+%24drug+%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fdbpedia.org%2Fontology%2FDrug%2FmeltingPoint%3E+%24melt+.+}+} Try this Query on our Information Workbench]

 * *Query 2.2:* Find all properties of Caffeine in Drugbank. Find all entities from all available databases describing Caffeine, return the union of all properties of any of these entities.

{{{
SELECT ?predicate ?object WHERE {
   { drugbank:DB00201 ?predicate ?object . }
  UNION
   { drugbank:DB00201 owl:sameAs ?caff .
     ?caff ?predicate ?object . } }
}}}

  [http://iwb.fluidops.com/search.jsp?q=SELECT+%3Fpredicate+%3Fobject+WHERE+{+{+%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fwww4.wiwiss.fu-berlin.de%2Fdrugbank%2Fresource%2Fdrugs%2FDB00201%3E+%3Fpredicate+%3Fobject+.+}+UNION+{+++%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fwww4.wiwiss.fu-berlin.de%2Fdrugbank%2Fresource%2Fdrugs%2FDB00201%3E+%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2002%2F07%2Fowl%23sameAs%3E+%3Fx+.+++%3Fx+%3Fpredicate+%3Fobject+}+} Try this Query on our Information Workbench]

 * *Query 2.3:* For all drugs in DBpedia, find all drugs they interact with, along with an explanation of the interaction.

{{{
SELECT ?Drug ?IntDrug ?IntEffect WHERE {
   ?Drug rdf:type dbpedia-owl:Drug .
   ?y owl:sameAs ?Drug .
   ?Int drugbank:interactionDrug1 ?y .
   ?Int drugbank:interactionDrug2 ?IntDrug .
   ?Int drugbank:text ?IntEffect . }
}}}

  [http://iwb.fluidops.com/search.jsp?q=SELECT+%24Drug+%24InteractionDrug+%24InteractionEffect+WHERE+{+%24Drug++++++++++%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F1999%2F02%2F22-rdf-syntax-ns%23type%3E++++++%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fdbpedia.org%2Fontology%2FDrug%3E.+%24y++++++++++++++%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2002%2F07%2Fowl%23sameAs%3E++++++++++%24Drug.+%24Interaction+%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fwww4.wiwiss.fu-berlin.de%2Fdrugbank%2Fresource%2Fdrugbank%2FinteractionDrug1%3E++++%24y%3B+++++++++++++++++++%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fwww4.wiwiss.fu-berlin.de%2Fdrugbank%2Fresource%2Fdrugbank%2FinteractionDrug2%3E+++%24InteractionDrug%3B+++++++++++++++++++%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fwww4.wiwiss.fu-berlin.de%2Fdrugbank%2Fresource%2Fdrugbank%2Ftext%3E++++++++++++++++++++%24InteractionEffect+} Try this Query on our Information Workbench]

 * *Query 2.4:* Find all the equations of reactions related to drugs from category Cathartics and their drug description.

{{{
SELECT ?drugDesc ?cpd ?equation WHERE {
   ?drug drugbank:drugCategory drugbank:cathartics .
   ?drug drugbank:keggCompoundId ?cpd .
   ?drug drugbank:description ?drugDesc .
   ?enzyme kegg:xSubstrate ?cpd .
   ?enzyme rdf:type kegg:Enzyme .
   ?reaction kegg:xEnzyme ?enzyme .
   ?reaction kegg:equation ?equation . }
}}}

  [http://iwb.fluidops.com/search.jsp?q=SELECT+%3FdrugDesc+%3Fequation+WHERE+{+%3Fdrug+%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fwww4.wiwiss.fu-berlin.de%2Fdrugbank%2Fresource%2Fdrugbank%2FdrugCategory%3E+%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fwww4.wiwiss.fu-berlin.de%2Fdrugbank%2Fresource%2Fdrugcategory%2Fcathartics%3E+.+%3Fdrug+%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fwww4.wiwiss.fu-berlin.de%2Fdrugbank%2Fresource%2Fdrugbank%2FkeggCompoundId%3E+%3Fcpd+.+%3Fdrug+%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fwww4.wiwiss.fu-berlin.de%2Fdrugbank%2Fresource%2Fdrugbank%2Fdescription%3E+%3FdrugDesc+.+%3Fenzyme+%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fbio2rdf.org%2Fns%2Fkegg%23xSubstrate%3E+%3Fcpd+.+%3Fenzyme+%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F1999%2F02%2F22-rdf-syntax-ns%23type%3E+%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fbio2rdf.org%2Fns%2Fkegg%23Enzyme%3E+.+%3Freaction+%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fbio2rdf.org%2Fns%2Fkegg%23xEnzyme%3E+%3Fenzyme+.+%3Freaction+%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fbio2rdf.org%2Fns%2Fkegg%23equation%3E+%3Fequation+.+} Try this Query on our Information Workbench]

 * *Query 2.5:* Find all drugs from Drugbank, together with the URL of the corresponding page stored in KEGG and the URL to the image derived from ChEBI.

{{{
SELECT ?drug ?keggUrl ?chebiImage WHERE {
   ?drug rdf:type drugbank:drugs .
   ?drug drugbank:keggCompoundId ?keggDrug .
   ?keggDrug kegg:url ?keggUrl .
   ?drug drugbank:genericName ?drugBankName .
   ?chebiDrug purl:title ?drugBankName .
   ?chebiDrug chebi:image ?chebiImage . }
}}}

  [http://iwb.fluidops.com/search.jsp?q=SELECT+%24drug+%24keggUrl+%24chebiImage+WHERE+{++%24drug+%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F1999%2F02%2F22-rdf-syntax-ns%23type%3E+%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fwww4.wiwiss.fu-berlin.de%2Fdrugbank%2Fresource%2Fdrugbank%2Fdrugs%3E+.++%24drug+%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fwww4.wiwiss.fu-berlin.de%2Fdrugbank%2Fresource%2Fdrugbank%2FkeggCompoundId%3E+%24keggDrug+.++%24keggDrug+%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fbio2rdf.org%2Fns%2Fbio2rdf%23url%3E+%24keggUrl+.++%24drug+%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fwww4.wiwiss.fu-berlin.de%2Fdrugbank%2Fresource%2Fdrugbank%2FgenericName%3E+%24drugBankName+.++%24chebiDrug+%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fpurl.org%2Fdc%2Felements%2F1.1%2Ftitle%3E+%24drugBankName+.++%24chebiDrug+%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fbio2rdf.org%2Fns%2Fbio2rdf%23image%3E+%24chebiImage+.+} Try this Query on our Information Workbench]

 * *Query 2.6:* Find KEGG drug names of all drugs in Drugbank belonging to category Micronutrient.

{{{
SELECT ?drug ?title WHERE {
   ?drug drugbank:drugCategory drugbank-owl:micronutrient> .
   ?drug drugbank:casRegistryNumber ?id .
   ?keggDrug rdf:type kegg:Drug .
   ?keggDrug kegg:xRef ?id .
   ?keggDrug purl:title ?title . }
}}}

  [http://iwb.fluidops.com/search.jsp?q=SELECT+%3Fdrug+%3Ftitle+WHERE+{+%3Fdrug+%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fwww4.wiwiss.fu-berlin.de%2Fdrugbank%2Fresource%2Fdrugbank%2FdrugCategory%3E+%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fwww4.wiwiss.fu-berlin.de%2Fdrugbank%2Fresource%2Fdrugcategory%2Fmicronutrient%3E+.+%3Fdrug+%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fwww4.wiwiss.fu-berlin.de%2Fdrugbank%2Fresource%2Fdrugbank%2FcasRegistryNumber%3E+%3Fid+.+%3FkeggDrug+%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F1999%2F02%2F22-rdf-syntax-ns%23type%3E+%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fbio2rdf.org%2Fns%2Fkegg%23Drug%3E+.+%3FkeggDrug+%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fbio2rdf.org%2Fns%2Fbio2rdf%23xRef%3E+%3Fid+.+%3FkeggDrug+%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fpurl.org%2Fdc%2Felements%2F1.1%2Ftitle%3E+%3Ftitle+.+} Try this Query on our Information Workbench]

 * *Query 2.7:* Find all drugs that affect humans and mammals. For those having a description of their biotransformation, also return this description. Show only those whose mass starts with a number larger then 5.

{{{
SELECT ?drug ?transform ?mass WHERE {
   ?drug drugbank:affectedOrganism  'Humans and other mammals'.
   ?drug drugbank:casRegistryNumber ?cas .
   ?keggDrug kegg:xRef ?cas .
   ?keggDrug kegg:mass ?mass
      FILTER ( ?mass > '5' )
      OPTIONAL { ?drug drugbank:biotransformation ?transform . } }
}}}

  [http://iwb.fluidops.com/search.jsp?q=SELECT+%24drug+%24transform+%24mass+WHERE+{++{+%24drug+%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fwww4.wiwiss.fu-berlin.de%2Fdrugbank%2Fresource%2Fdrugbank%2FaffectedOrganism%3E++%27Humans+and+other+mammals%27.++++%24drug+%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fwww4.wiwiss.fu-berlin.de%2Fdrugbank%2Fresource%2Fdrugbank%2FcasRegistryNumber%3E+%24cas+.+++++++%24keggDrug+%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fbio2rdf.org%2Fns%2Fbio2rdf%23xRef%3E+%24cas+.++++%24keggDrug+%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fbio2rdf.org%2Fns%2Fbio2rdf%23mass%3E+%24mass++++FILTER+%28+%24mass+%3E+%275%27+%29++++}++OPTIONAL+{+%24drug+%3Chttp%3A%2F%2Fwww4.wiwiss.fu-berlin.de%2Fdrugbank%2Fresource%2Fdrugbank%2Fbiotransformation%3E+%24transform+.+}+} Try this Query on our Information Workbench]
